title: Solving medical mysteries
description: Biochemist Joe DeRisi talks about amazing new ways to diagnose viruses (and treat the illnesses they cause) using DNA. His work may help us understand malaria, SARS, avian flu -- and the 60 percent of everyday viral infections that go undiagnosed.
author: Joe DeRisi
keywords: TED, talks, global issues, illness, medicine, science, technology, virus
